name: Shield Bash
description:
Whoops, I didn't upload all the files. I can't update the download link since it's past submission time, but here's a link with all the files included.

https://github.com/wenright/GMTKJ18/releases/download/1.0/shield-bash.zip

I've hidden the incomplete download link to avoid confusion.

Dodge attacks while you wait for your shield to charge, then use your shield to smash into their ships and gain extra armor.

WASD or arrow keys to move, space bar activates your shield.

Each wave you gain an additional armor container which can be filled by destroying an enemy ship with your shield, up to 15 containers.

Source code is available here!

https://github.com/wenright/GMTKJ18
